original_title: ayumi hamasaki TROUBLE TOUR 2020 A ~サイゴノトラブル~
overview: ayumi hamasaki TROUBLE TOUR 2020 A ~Saigo no Trouble~ is a concert DVD/Blu-ray released by Hamasaki Ayumi. It was supposed to span several months and visit more than 20 prefectures, but due to the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic most of the tour had to be cancelled. This was the FINAL tour on 10/20/2020.
title: ayumi hamasaki TROUBLE TOUR 2020 A ~Saigo no Trouble~
